name: obs-timer-controller
description: Handling browser sources for OBS related to timers and countdowns.

scripts.pkg-win: electron-packager . OBS-Timer-Controller --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --app-version=1.0.8 --out=dist --overwrite --icon=icon.ico --author="XtoManuel" --description="Handling browser sources for OBS related to timers and countdowns."
scripts.pkg-linux: electron-packager . OBS-Timer-Controller --platform=linux --arch=x64 --app-version=1.0.8 --out=dist --overwrite --icon=icon.ico --author="XtoManuel" --description="Handling browser sources for OBS related to timers and countdowns."
scripts.pkg-mac: electron-packager . OBS-Timer-Controller --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --app-version=1.0.8 --out=dist --overwrite --icon=icon.icns --author="XtoManuel" --description="Handling browser sources for OBS related to timers and countdowns."
scripts.pkg-all: npm run pkg-win && npm run pkg-linux

author: XtoManuel
